snippet.title: Guitar Freaks Arcade Gameplay (MAME, Guitar Hero Controller)
snippet.description: After re-purchasing a Guitar Hero guitar and games, I decided I wanted to try the game that inspired them all. Luckily, the Xbox 360 Guitar Hero guitar works flawlessly with this game in MAME, so I'm able to get an experience close to the arcade original. This game is hard as hell, and as you can tell I'm not particularly good at it, but it's extremely addictive and a lot of fun.
